greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of number triangle A120111.
comment: The last row of the columns in tables A133232 and A133233 are given by this sequence via the formula: if n < k + k*abs(a(n)) then k, otherwise 1 (1 <= k <= n). - _Mats Granvik_, Jan 22 2008
link: Muniru A Asiru, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
program: (PARI) a(n) = if (n==0, 1, 1 - lcm(vector(n+1, k, k))/lcm(vector(n, k, k))); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 11 2016
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jun 09 2006
